abstract: Merck, the pharmaceutical group, said Wednesday that 16,000 jobs would be lost as it combined operations with its rival Schering-Plough.
snippet: Merck, the pharmaceutical group, said Wednesday that 16,000 jobs would be lost as it combined operations with its rival Schering-Plough.
lead_paragraph: Merck, the pharmaceutical group, said Wednesday that 16,000 jobs would be lost as it joined its operations with its rival Schering-Plough, the French daily La Tribune reported.

headline.main: Merck to Shed 16,000 Jobs as It Buys Schering
